object.name: ChatMemberUpdated
object.description: This object represents changes in the status of a chat member.
object.html_description: This object represents changes in the status of a chat member.
object.rst_description: This object represents changes in the status of a chat member.

annotations.description: Performer of the action, which resulted in the change
annotations.html_description: Performer of the action, which resulted in the change
annotations.rst_description: Performer of the action, which resulted in the change
annotations.name: from

annotations.description: Date the change was done in Unix time
annotations.html_description: Date the change was done in Unix time
annotations.rst_description: Date the change was done in Unix time
annotations.name: date

annotations.description: Previous information about the chat member
annotations.rst_description: Previous information about the chat member
annotations.name: old_chat_member

annotations.description: New information about the chat member
annotations.rst_description: New information about the chat member
annotations.name: new_chat_member

annotations.description: Chat invite link, which was used by the user to join the chat; for joining by invite link events only.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Chat invite link, which was used by the user to join the chat; for joining by invite link events only.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Chat invite link, which was used by the user to join the chat; for joining by invite link events only.
annotations.name: invite_link

annotations.description: True, if the user joined the chat after sending a direct join request without using an invite link and being approved by an administrator
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the user joined the chat after sending a direct join request without using an invite link and being approved by an administrator
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the user joined the chat after sending a direct join request without using an invite link and being approved by an administrator
annotations.name: via_join_request

annotations.description: True, if the user joined the chat via a chat folder invite link
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the user joined the chat via a chat folder invite link
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the user joined the chat via a chat folder invite link
annotations.name: via_chat_folder_invite_link
